title.rendered: Pre-UK Black Business Week Sunday Lunch

content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” bg_color=”#1b203e” bg_image=”6281″ bg_position=”center top” background_image_loading=”default” bg_repeat=”no-repeat” scene_position=”center” top_padding=”7%” bottom_padding=”10″ translate_y=”0″ text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” id=”services” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” top_margin=”5%” bottom_margin=”5%” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”2/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”Pre-UK Black Business Week Sunday Lunch” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:44|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:50px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=””][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1748949562867{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” text_direction=”default”]

Sunday 12th October

Exclusive Invite Only

[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation image_url=”22313″ image_size=”full” animation_type=”entrance” animation=”None” animation_movement_type=”transform_y” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1748949596338{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” text_direction=”default”]

An exclusive pre-event gathering hosted by Raphael Sofoluke, Founder & CEO of UK Black Business Week, in collaboration with Goldman Sachs 10KSB. This intimate lunch provides a unique networking opportunity for a select group of high-achieving Black business owners (with 6- to 8-figure revenues) ahead of UK Black Business Week.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1748949727532{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” text_direction=”default”]

in Partnership with

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20″][divider line_type=”No Line”][divider line_type=”No Line”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Lee Chambers

CEO, Male Allies UK[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Lee Chambers is the chief psychologist and founder of Essentialise and Male Allies UK. After a diverse career, from corporate finance to building and exiting tech companies, he is now focused on supporting organisations to engage men in inclusion and promote effective allyship. He has been featured on the Startups 100 Index, has received a Great British Entrepreneur Award, and sits on the board of CMI Women, Regenerage and the Manchester Metropolitan University Business School. In 2024, he received the Freedom of the City of London for services to equality in business.

He is a Kavli Fellow of the National Academy of Sciences in the USA, the first Black British scientist to be awarded in it’s 33-year history, received for his work on health inequalities. He is the 2023 UN Women Changemaker of the Year, and is an ambassador for the UK Governments Lilac Review for Disabled Entrepreneurship. He speaks globally on allyship and intersectionality, having taken the stage at One Young World, ChangeNOW and the Bloomberg Global Equality Summit, and is the author of the upcoming book, Momentum: Reboot Your Career, Unlock Your Potential.

Personally, he shares his experiences as a Black autistic man, a stay-at-home dad, and his journey to learn to walk again after acquiring a chronic illness. He lives near Preston with his two children.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”Full Width Line” line_thickness=”1″ divider_color=”default”
